context.description: For information on this debugger feature, select:
The Overlays window displays information about overlays used in your application. For more information, click the link below.
The Terminal simulator emulates a terminal being driven by a UART simulator. For more information, click one of the links below.

topic.label: Specifying a Terminal or COMM-Port Simulator

context.description: The Instruction history -- SmaRT Trace window lets you view and capture trace data if your processor includes a SmaRT unit. For more information, click the link below.
The timer0 and timer1 windows show the contents of each bit in a tree view if you build your application to include a timer. For more information, click the link below.
The timer0 and timer1 windows show the contents of each bit in a tree view if you build your application to include a timer. For more information, click the link below.
You use the CMPD Debugger Configuration tab to configure CMPD processes. For more information, click the link below.
You can configure processes individually using the Edit Process dialog. For more information, click the link below.
Select an item in the tree view to configure related debugger options. For more information, click the link below.
